channel.title: Java help!
channel.description:
Okay, i have done this at least 500 times. (Yes atleast, because i have been on my computer for at least 14 hours just doing it.) I have downloaded the latest java JDK and all it does is download and install, but when i go to click run.bat it says 'java' blah blah blah. I am using Winrar and i have, again, downloaded and installed the latest Java JDK and JRE. But it keeps on doing the same **** over and over again. So some one PLEASE HELP ME! AGAIN I HAVE DONE THE JAVA THING AT LEAST 500 TIMES JUST TODAY. I HAVE GONE ON RUNESCAPE TO SEE IF IT JUST HAD TO BE CONFIGURED BUT IT DIDN'T HELP!
:mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: some one please help.
